reason: Plan design complete: 65 atomic steps across 9 phases covering all 5 features. File map, goals, success criteria, and architecture decisions documented. Ready for Executor to begin Phase 1 (Foundation & Splitting).

data.recommended_execution_order: Phase 1 first (foundation/splitting). Phases 2, 6, 7 can run in any order after Phase 1. Phase 3 after Phase 1. Phase 4 after Phase 1. Phase 5 after Phase 4. Phase 8 after Phases 3, 4, 7. Phase 9 last.
notes: plan.tools.ts MUST be split (Phase 1) before Phase 3 adds program features
Builder Phase 2 and Context Optimization Phase 6 are independent - can run in parallel
Phase 9 (final docs) must be last to capture all changes
SkillWriter and Worker are new AgentType additions - need careful validation testing
